00026 /* This class supports obfuscation and encryption for a *Mule tcp connection.
00027    Right now only basic obfusication is supported, but this can be expanded, as their is a
00028    dedicated handshake to negotiate the encryption method used.
00029 
00030    Please note, even if obfuscation uses encryption methods, it does not fulfill cryptographic standards since it
00031    doesn't use secret (and for rc4 important: unique) keys
00032 */
00033 
00034 #ifndef __ENCRYPTEDSTREAMSOCKET_H__
00035 #define __ENCRYPTEDSTREAMSOCKET_H__
00036 
00037 #include <wx/wx.h>
00038 #include <wx/string.h>
00039 
00040 // cryptoPP used for DH integer calculations
00041 #include "CryptoPP_Inc.h"   // Needed for Crypto functions
00042 #include "Proxy.h"
00043 #include "Types.h"
00044 
00045 #include "RC4Encrypt.h"
00046 
00047 #define ERR_WRONGHEADER         0x01
00048 #define ERR_TOOBIG          0x02
00049 #define ERR_ENCRYPTION          0x03
00050 #define ERR_ENCRYPTION_NOTALLOWED   0x04
00051 
00052 enum EStreamCryptState {
00053     ECS_NONE = 0,           // Disabled or not available
00054     ECS_UNKNOWN,            // Incoming connection, will test the first incoming data for encrypted protocol
00055     ECS_PENDING,            // Outgoing connection, will start sending encryption protocol
00056     ECS_PENDING_SERVER,     // Outgoing serverconnection, will start sending encryption protocol
00057     ECS_NEGOTIATING,        // Encryption supported, handshake still uncompleted
00058     ECS_ENCRYPTING          // Encryption enabled
00059 };
00060 
00061 enum ENegotiatingState {
00062     ONS_NONE,
00063 
00064     ONS_BASIC_CLIENTA_RANDOMPART,
00065     ONS_BASIC_CLIENTA_MAGICVALUE,
00066     ONS_BASIC_CLIENTA_METHODTAGSPADLEN,
00067     ONS_BASIC_CLIENTA_PADDING,
00068 
00069     ONS_BASIC_CLIENTB_MAGICVALUE,
00070     ONS_BASIC_CLIENTB_METHODTAGSPADLEN,
00071     ONS_BASIC_CLIENTB_PADDING,
00072 
00073     ONS_BASIC_SERVER_DHANSWER,
00074     ONS_BASIC_SERVER_MAGICVALUE,
00075     ONS_BASIC_SERVER_METHODTAGSPADLEN,
00076     ONS_BASIC_SERVER_PADDING,
00077     ONS_BASIC_SERVER_DELAYEDSENDING,
00078 
00079     ONS_COMPLETE
00080 };
00081 
00082 enum EEncryptionMethods {
00083     ENM_OBFUSCATION = 0x00
00084 };
00085 
00086 
00087 class CEncryptedStreamSocket : public CSocketClientProxy
00088 {
00089 public:
00090     CEncryptedStreamSocket(wxSocketFlags flags = wxSOCKET_NONE, const CProxyData *proxyData = NULL);
00091     virtual ~CEncryptedStreamSocket();
00092 
00093     void SetConnectionEncryption(bool bEnabled, const uint8_t *pTargetClientHash, bool bServerConnection);
00094 
00097     uint32_t GetRealReceivedBytes() const       { return m_nObfusicationBytesReceived; }
00098 
00099     bool    IsObfusicating() const          { return m_StreamCryptState == ECS_ENCRYPTING && m_EncryptionMethod == ENM_OBFUSCATION; }
00100     bool    IsServerCryptEnabledConnection() const  { return m_bServerCrypt; }
00101 
00102     uint8_t m_dbgbyEncryptionSupported;
00103     uint8_t m_dbgbyEncryptionRequested;
00104     uint8_t m_dbgbyEncryptionMethodSet;
00105 
00106 protected:
00107     int Write(const void* lpBuf, uint32_t nBufLen);
00108     int Read(void* lpBuf, uint32_t nBufLen);
00109 
00110     virtual void OnError(int /*nErrorCode*/) {};
00111     virtual void OnSend(int nErrorCode);
00112 
00113     wxString    DbgGetIPString();
00114     void        CryptPrepareSendData(uint8_t* pBuffer, uint32_t nLen);
00115     bool        IsEncryptionLayerReady();
00116     uint8_t     GetSemiRandomNotProtocolMarker() const;
00117 
00118     uint32_t        m_nObfusicationBytesReceived;
00119     EStreamCryptState   m_StreamCryptState;
00120     EEncryptionMethods  m_EncryptionMethod;
00121     bool            m_bFullReceive;
00122     bool            m_bServerCrypt;
00123 
00124 private:
00125     int Negotiate(const uint8_t* pBuffer, uint32_t nLen);
00126     void    StartNegotiation(bool bOutgoing);
00127     int SendNegotiatingData(const void *lpBuf, uint32_t nBufLen, uint32_t nStartCryptFromByte = 0, bool bDelaySend = false);
00128 
00129     ENegotiatingState   m_NegotiatingState;
00130     CRC4EncryptableBuffer   m_pfiReceiveBuffer;
00131     uint32_t        m_nReceiveBytesWanted;
00132     CRC4EncryptableBuffer   m_pfiSendBuffer;
00133     uint32_t        m_nRandomKeyPart;
00134     CryptoPP::Integer   m_cryptDHA;
00135 };
